permafrost.tundra.server.content

Class HTTPStateHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.server.content.HTTPStateHelper

  • public final class HTTPStateHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with the Integration Server HTTPState object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private HTTPStateHelper()
      Disallow instantiation of this class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String getHeader(com.wm.app.b2b.server.HTTPState httpState, java.lang.String header)
      Returns the value associated with the given HTTP header from the given HTTPState object, or null if the header does not exist.
      static void removeHeader(com.wm.app.b2b.server.HTTPState httpState, java.lang.String header)
      Removes the given header from the given HTTPState object.

    • Method Detail

      • getHeader

        public static java.lang.String getHeader(com.wm.app.b2b.server.HTTPState httpState,
                                         java.lang.String header)
        Returns the value associated with the given HTTP header from the given HTTPState object, or null if the header does not exist.
        Parameters:
        httpState - An HTTPState object.
        header - The HTTP header whose value is to be returned.
        Returns:
        The value associated with the given HTTP header, or null if the header does not exist.

      • removeHeader

        public static void removeHeader(com.wm.app.b2b.server.HTTPState httpState,
                                java.lang.String header)
        Removes the given header from the given HTTPState object.
        Parameters:
        httpState - An HTTPState object.
        header - The HTTP header to be removed.
